```{r}
library(knitr)

GDP_trade<-read.csv("GDP_Trade.csv",header=TRUE)
class(GDP_trade$Location)
length(GDP_trade)
ncol(GDP_trade)
length(GDP_trade$Year)
nrow(GDP_trade)
unique(GDP_trade$Location)
year<-GDP_trade$Year
head(sort(year,decreasing = TRUE))
6>5
"Learning R"=="learning R"
r<-6>5
r
class(r)
x<-c(4,5,1,2,0)
x
x>=2
x>2|x<=1
x>0&x<=2
sum(x>0&x<=2)
GDP<-GDP_trade[,"GDP"]
head(GDP)
GDP_trade_1_5<-GDP_trade[1:5,]
GDP_trade_1_5
GDP_trade_1_5<-GDP_trade[1:5,"GDP"]
GDP_trade_1_5
GDP_Oman<-GDP_trade[GDP_trade$Location=="Oman","GDP"]
head(GDP_Oman)
mean(GDP_trade$GDP,na.rm = TRUE)
mean(GDP_trade[GDP_trade$Location=="Oman","GDP"],na.rm = TRUE)
mean(GDP_trade$GDP[GDP_trade$Location=="Oman"],na.rm=TRUE)



mean(GDP_trade[GDP_trade$Location=="Thailand","GDP"],na.rm = TRUE)

mean(GDP_trade[GDP_trade$Location=="United States","GDP"],na.rm = TRUE)



GDP_trade$High_GDP<-ifelse(GDP_trade$GDP>=mean(GDP_trade$GDP,na.rm=TRUE),1,0)
tapply(GDP_trade$GDP,GDP_trade$Year,mean,na.rm=TRUE)
library("ggplot2")
GDP_trade_OT<-GDP_trade[GDP_trade$Location=="Oman"|GDP_trade$Location=="Thailand",]
GDP_trade_OT<-GDP_trade_OT[complete.cases(GDP_trade_OT$GDP),]
ggplot(GDP_trade_OT,aes(x=Year,y=GDP))+geom_point(aes(color=Location))+scale_color_manual(values=c("purple","green"))+labs(x="Year",y="Gross Domestic Product",title = "Gross Domestic Product by Year for Oman and Thailand")
ggsave("Year_GDP_Plot_200622.pdf",plot=last_plot(),width=5, height=5,units="in")



GDP_trade_US_Jordan<-GDP_trade[GDP_trade$Location=="United States"|GDP_trade$Location=="Jordan",]
GDP_trade_US_Jordan<-GDP_trade_US_Jordan[complete.cases(GDP_trade_US_Jordan$GDP),]
ggplot(GDP_trade_US_Jordan,aes(x=Year,y=GDP))+geom_point(aes(color=Location))+scale_color_manual(values=c("pink","blue"))+labs(x="Year",y="Gross Domestic Product",title="Gross Domestic Product by Year for the United States and Jordan")
ggsave("Year_GDP_Plot_US_Jordan_200622_SH.pdf",plot=last_plot(),width=5,height=5,units="in")
```
